name: Magnetic Fieldball
description:
This game is about a 2v2 team game with magnets! Try use magnets to attract ball as well as other players. Borders and obstacles have magnets too! Score goals to win the game.

This game has different modes but the single player one  (1+3 bots) is still in progress.
You will have a better experience playing online with at least 2 people(4 max.), but you can try whatever you want.

If you are a Linux user, mark the file as executable before opening it (command "chmod +x nameofexecutable" in terminal)
If you are Mac user, and your file is not working, try this command on terminal:
"chmod a+x mac_build.app/Contents/MacOS/*"

 In any case, let us know what do you think and what should be improved with feedbacks!
